name: Delivery!!
description:
Delivery!! is a 2D side-scrolling, platformer game. You play as a regular paperboy…but one day, you’re assigned the task of keeping the world at peace?!

Run and jump around delivering coloured packages from kingdom to kingdom to keep relations between them cordial. However, there are watchful guards that will try to stop you if their kingdom is angry.

Deliver packages, prevent war.

Made in 48 hours for the GMTK 2021 game jam.   

How to play?

Arrow keys to move left, right

Space to jump

E to drop off boxes

Credits: 

Jimmy Tan: Programming

Darren Tran: Level Design, programming

Thomas Liu: Programming

Michelle Vu: Art

Chris Wiens: Music

Special thanks to Ricci Ebron for the jump sfx and David Koo for the itch.io banner.

Credits to Ansimuz for the Sunny Land asset in which we used the tileset to create our level layout.
